subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: North Carolina State point guard Farnold Degand is out for the season with a torn anterior cruciate ligament in his left knee. Degand, a sophomore, had started all 10 games for the Wolfpack (7-3) this season and was averaging 6.9 points, 3.2 rebounds and 28.6 minutes. He led the Wolfpack in assists and 3-point shooting.
